Gaia Rossi

CS student

Biography

I am a CS student at Univeristy of Ferrara, graduating in October 2021.
I graduated at high school in 2018 as a computer expert.

My main interests are in Python automation, with some expirence on Telegram bots and web scraping.
I am also interested in Web developing, with some knowledge in PHP, JavaScript and the Laravel Framework.

I am currently working with my University in an IoT system that requires an application, written in Python, that can move a robotic arm with the help of accelerometers and sensors.
